text: Pages .Wednesday , 14 August 2013 .I 've changed a lot since I first started this blog , but I still remember the events that made me create this .Originally , I hoped for this to be the kind of blog that I could share with my friends .That 's why in my first post I avoided outrightly mentioning Dev .Of course , I was quite bad at concealing my love for him , since he was the reason why I made this blog , so I quickly ended up deciding that this would be just my blog .

Over the next few months it evolved into a place for my little ramblings and silliness , which is so much fun to look back now .I 've changed , and lately my eyes have been roving .Sure , an adorable laughing James Stewart adorns my iPod wallpaper and Leslie Howard rules my home screen , but I can never forget Dev .He was the first person I ever allowed myself to fall in love with , and that I did , hard .Everyone has these other guys who are amazing too , but for me , there 's only one king of my heart .

He has given me so much happiness , so many late nights , and god , do I love him .But of course , I did n't make this post just for that .I 've seen all these great blogs , and all of them just ended abruptly .Just a post , and nothing after that .So this is a sorta " auld lang syne " thing .A farewell post .Now , that 's not to say I will never , ever post on here - who knows ?Maybe I will .

It 's just not right , for a blog which enshrines and keeps all my happy memories of those 2011 afternoons , those lazy days , which are now gone with the wind .Monday , 23 April 2012 .SERIOUSLY .Seriously , seriously , maar daala .No , it 's not Dev 's dialogue from Nau Do Gyarah , but ! hfjdskl KA , J DWKSG TGFMB FN CGIH;LBT , GFK , LG NGLHJL GGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGFKY . -lying dead on floor- .No .No .No .Nahin .Nahin .Nahiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiin .Long story short , my English teacher gives us compositions to write , with a given theme and all that stuff .

I do n't overdo the masala and all that , but I did it twice this year .And my teacher liked them so much ... .The first one 's theme was , " write about a time when you felt powerless to stop something " .I got an idea .Tere Ghar Ke Samne ? :DSo I did write about that , but I had to leave out the EPIC ROMANCE !I know , it was really bad .I did n't take the POV of Rakesh or Sulekha , ( I was afraid of going out of character and ruining it completely - besides , I ca n't describe Dev .

I feel embarassed to go further .Long story short , I BUTCHERED the ending ( I took Padosan 's ending .Please do n't kill me . ) , left out the epic romance ( No mention of Qutub Minar !I feel so bad ! ) , and did n't even get to the main point .I had only an hour to write the story , so yeah .:PAfter that , I felt so bad , so bad , SO BAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAD .-cries- .Now , I have no idea how and why my teacher liked it .

AND ... AND MY DESCRIPTION OF DEV WAS FAIL AND OH MY GOD .OAF .OAF .OAF .OAF . I'MAN OAF .IGGG;K TRM OH MY GOD .THEY LIKED IT .MY CLASS LIKED IT .I AM SERIOUS .THEY LIKED IT .YOU KNOW WHAT .MY TEACHER CALLED THEM ROMEO AND JULIET .

-CRIES- HOW ...GOLDIE MUST BE STARING AT ME FROM UP THERE .Saturday , 24 March 2012 .Do n't worry , I have n't died .I have n't abandoned this either .I just started focusing on my new blog , Bombay Noir , which is hosted on Wordpress .I do n't know - I do n't think I can ever be the crazy Funtoosh who spazzed like heck over Dil Ka Bhanwar , or the one that wrote the sweet and childish descriptions for the YouTube videos .Ever since Dev was gone ... .

I try to pick fights with everyone there is , and Goldie and Rafi are like , " No , stop it ." I do n't know , I do n't feel as angry as before .I just want to cry all over again and rewind the clock to those days .I melted twice over the past month - not the insane four - minute melt , neither the two hour slow melt , but a mix of the two .I do n't spaz - I just become so absorbed in the song that anything else does n't matter anymore .

I 'm currently working on improving the Tere Ghar Ke Samne article on Wikipedia , so I was scouting around on Google for external links to add in .And I came across the Rotten Tomatoes thingy for it .Never mind the site , IT WAS LISTED AS 1951 .WOW WORLD , YOU FAIL .Everyone knows it 's a 1963 movie , that has been engraved in my mind too .1951 was when Baazi was released .Come on .He looks so different .And by then , Kalpana Kartik had already quit films .

I demand to know why . xD .But the tantalizing dates ... they 're there all right , but I do n't know whether to trust them or not .Oh , and speaking of dates , I recently found out that Guide was released on 6 February 1965 .That was cool !Now , if it was on 9th February ...xDDDDDDD .Well , anyway , I 've improved on the plot , and also found a review that made me get hyper while the cold wind was blowing through the door .Yay for Dev .
